text: "Two Less Lonely People in the World" is a 1982 song by English-Australian band Air Supply. It is the third single from their seventh studio album Now and Forever. It went to number 38 in the United States and number 46 in Australia. It was a better hit on adult contemporary radio in Canada and the United States. ==References== Category:1982 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Air Supply songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Two Less Lonely People in the World
